“Busy day…but there’s always time for the paper.”

Things have been busy and will continue to be so. There is more good news to come. There is work to be done. It still comes and goes in waves. There are still a couple things I wrestle with and perhaps will make observations about on this blog but for the most part this is wrapping itself up and I am trying to strategize a move back to–and re-inclusion of the archives of–my regular blog.

Here are some pics of recent life:

The Memorial Record

Colophon

I am Daniel Miller and I'm writing here about my attempts to deal with the loss of my beautiful, perfect one year old daughter Margot Rose. You can read about that here.

This site runs on Jekyll, which I still haven't really figured out. Header foreground & footer background is Snowy Flora. If you are using IE, you should switch to Google Chrome; you will thank me later.
